rows.label: qst200503_msg032
rows.name: Hey, you. You're a Driver, ain'tcha?

rows.label: qst200503_msg033
rows.name: Me? Yeah...?

rows.label: qst200503_msg034
rows.name: So you are! Ah, what a stroke of luck!

rows.label: qst200503_msg035
rows.name:
I was just looking for someone to
pick up a few bits 'n' bobs for me.

rows.label: qst200503_msg001
rows.name: Bits and bobs...?

rows.label: qst200503_msg002
rows.name:
That's right. It was, oh, about a year
ago now. My ship ran aground, and
did I feel like a fool.

rows.label: qst200503_msg003
rows.name:
She was a good 'un, but I had to
abandon her, along with all the
cargo she was carrying.

rows.label: qst200503_msg004
rows.name: What sort of cargo are we talking here?

rows.label: qst200503_msg005
rows.name: ...Paintings.

rows.label: qst200503_msg006
rows.name: Oh?

rows.label: qst200503_msg007
rows.name:
That's what I was hoping you could
pick up: my very own works of art.

rows.label: qst200503_msg012
rows.name: So you're an artist?

rows.label: qst200503_msg013
rows.name: Not by trade, no.

rows.label: qst200503_msg014
rows.name:
But I dabble, and it is a passion
of mine, I can't deny.

rows.label: qst200503_msg015
rows.name:
I'm not the best of artists, not by a
long shot, but I still poured my heart
and soul into those paintings.

rows.label: qst200503_msg036
rows.name:
I'd almost given up on them, to tell
you the truth. But it's been a year now
and I'm still dwelling on this...

rows.label: qst200503_msg037
rows.name:
Whadda you say? Could you help
me out here?

rows.label: qst200503_msg016
rows.name:
I can see that the paintings are very
important to you...

rows.label: qst200503_msg017
rows.name:
All right. We'll get them back for
you, I promise.

rows.label: qst200503_msg018
rows.name: Really?! Oh, that's fantastic!

rows.label: qst200503_msg019
rows.name:
So where's this ship of yours that
ran aground?

rows.label: qst200503_msg020
rows.name: Ah, hmm. About that...

rows.label: qst200503_msg021
rows.name: Something wrong?

rows.label: qst200503_msg022
rows.name:
Well, it was my ship, but I wasn't
exactly in command. I'd always left
the navigation down to the captain.

rows.label: qst200503_msg038
rows.name:
And when it ran aground, I wasn't
actually on board...

rows.label: qst200503_msg039
rows.name:
So, I'm afraid I can't tell you its exact
co-ordinates...

rows.label: qst200503_msg023
rows.name: Oh, come on!

rows.label: qst200503_msg024
rows.name:
All right, it might take some looking
around, then.

rows.label: qst200503_msg025
rows.name:
I imagine it will, yeah...
I wonder where it got to.

rows.label: qst200503_msg026
rows.name:
Hmm. Were you acquainted with any
of the crew?

rows.label: qst200503_msg027
rows.name:
Oh, of course! One of them's bound
to know something, eh?

rows.label: qst200503_msg028
rows.name:
So could you tell us a bit about your
old crew, Alban?

rows.label: qst200503_msg029
rows.name:
Righto. I count three in town right now.
They shouldn't be hard to track down.

rows.label: qst200503_msg030
rows.name:
Their names are Bennett, Gamri,
and Rhidluk.

rows.label: qst200503_msg042
rows.name: Thanks again, and good luck!

rows.label: qst200503_msg031
rows.name:
No problem. We'll take care of this,
Yuou's your uncle!
